docs.lead_paragraph: New city regulations forbidding abortions in doctors' offices and clinics lacking certain medical equipment took effect yesterday amid controversy and confusion over the ability of already overburdened hospitals to handle the demand for abortions.

headline.main: New Abortion Rules Take Effect, Complicating Confused Picture; New Abortion Rules Complicate Confused Situation

docs.abstract: survey showing that new NYC regulations forbidding abortions in doctors' offices and clinics lacking certain medical equipment are causing controversy and confusion over ability of already overburdened hosps to handle demand for abortions
docs.snippet: New city regulations forbidding abortions in doctors' offices and clinics lacking certain medical equipment took effect yesterday amid controversy and confusion over the ability of already overburdened hospitals to handle the demand for abortions.
